Resolved Question Show me another » What fast food restaurant? What fast food restaurant pays the most starting out? And what is the worst fast food place to work at? 6 months ago Report Abuse by Jark Member since: 02 January 2012 Total points: 617 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Burger King has been nationally recognized on multiple occasions as being the filthiest restaurant in the United States. Their standards for hiring are lower than others, and the quality and cleanliness of their facilities have been the focal point of multiple complaints over the years. Try submitting a FOIA request in your area for restaurant health code violations and you'll see what I mean. 6 months ago Report Abuse
